title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I try to view the type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
EB: When I try to view the type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. The error message should not be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant) and attempt to view the type hierarchy. Check if the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is displayed.
